<h3>**Hello world!**</h3>

<h2 class="custom-subtitle">

Welcome to my world!

</h2>

This website will explore my adventures around the world!

I will be using leaflet to create an interactive map of my travels! To begin, this map explores the locations I have lived.

https://quarto.org/docs/interactive/widgets/htmlwidgets.html

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
df <- tribble(~long, ~lat, ~name,
           -77.4169, 39.1459, "Hometown",
           -71.3128, 41.4901, "1996-1997",
           -76.6019, 39.4015, "2013-2016",
           -120.2308, 37.8389, "2020",
           -112.0740, 33.4484, "2021-2022",
           -119.6982, 34.4308, "2022-2023")

leaflet(df) |> 
  addTiles() |>  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(~long, ~lat, popup = ~name)
```
